title: In Game Chat Hack?
body:
I found a couple results searching through Google about a chat hack but they were old. Is there a common chat hack that people use to see their opponents team chat?

Ive had several incidents recently where the enemy team responds DIRECTLY to my teams chat in solo ranked.

Im not looking for a link, just knowing that this is common thing. Ill probably NEVER use in game chat again.

replies.body: Unless it's in all chat, I haven't heard of anything like this happening.  Feel free to reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we can take a closer look.  Otherwise, if such a thing does exist we do have systems to knock down exploits.  Hope that helps offer some relief!
